DataSource.Query: SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY orders.order_id) AS "S No", orders.order_id as "Inv Id", customers.customer_name, orders.value_date, orders.expected_delivery_date as "delivery date", items.item_name, order_details.quantity, units.unit_name, order_details.price, order_details.price * order_details.quantity as "Amount", orders.terms FROM sales.orders JOIN inventory.customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN sales.order_details ON orders.order_id = order_details.order_id JOIN inventory.items ON order_details.item_id = items.item_id JOIN inventory.units ON order_details.unit_id = units.unit_id WHERE orders.office_id = @OfficeId and orders.cancelled = false AND orders.expected_delivery_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date
